alert.note: Alert for Choctaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 25 at 1:48PM CDT until May 25 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHOCTAW...WESTERN OKTIBBEHA...EASTERN WEBSTER AND CLAY COUNTIES... At 148 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Clarkson to near Ackerman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Cumberland around 155 PM CDT. Montpelier around 205 PM CDT. Pheba around 215 PM CDT. Griffith around 225 PM CDT. Pala Alto around 230 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Mantee and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
